name: Joyce
line: I'm right here. Just hold on.

name: Unknown
line: She says he feels like he's burning. Check for burns.

name: Unknown
line: Where does it hurt the most, Will?

name: Steve
line: First it was like that. Now he's like this.

name: Dustin
line: I swear to God, man, it's just some little lizard, okay?

name: Steve
line: How do I know if it's not?

name: Dustin
line: How do you know it's not just a lizard?

name: Steve
line: Because his face opened up and he ate my cat.

name: Steve
line: All right, listen, kid. I swear, if this is some sort of Halloween prank, you're dead.

name: Steve
line: Get it out of my face.

name: Dustin
line: You got a key for this thing?

name: Dustin
line: He must be further down there.

name: Dustin
line: I'll stay up here in case he tries to escape.

name: Dustin
line: Steve, what's going on down there?

name: Joyce
line: That thing, it... it did something to him.

name: Owens
line: Okay. And these now-memories, as you call them, how long has he been experiencing them?

name: Joyce
line: I told you, since Thursday. Since I found him in the field.

name: Owens
line: And why wasn't he brought in?

name: Joyce
line: I have been bringing him in, and what have you done? Nothing. Nothing!

name: Joyce
line: No. No, he has been telling you over and over that something's wrong, and you said it was all in his head. You said, 'Be patient.' Those were your words.

name: Owens
line: I understand that you're upset, okay? I get it. I would be, too, if I were in your shoes. But we are all in the same boat here, and I just need you to try...

name: Joyce
line: No, I want him transferred to a real hospital.

name: Owens
line: Well, you know that's not possible.

name: Unknown
line: He really will get the best treatment here, Mrs. Byers.

name: Joyce
line: And what are you treating him for, exactly? Can anyone tell me what's wrong with him? Can a single person in this room tell me what is wrong with my boy? What is wrong with my boy?

name: Owens
line: You see why I have to stop the truth from spreading, too. Just the same as those weeds there. By whatever means necessary.

name: Murray
line: Whoo-hoo! To taking down the man.

name: Murray
line: Commie bastards sure know how to make a spirit. Am I right?

name: Nancy
line: Oh, no, no, no. We... we can't.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, no. No, I've got to drive.

name: Murray
line: Would be proud if they knew what you were up to. Just tell 'em you're at Tammy's or Dawn's or whoever's, and take my guest room.

name: Jonathan
line: I mean, do... do you want to stay?

name: Jonathan
line: Okay. Uh... Could I use the sofa?

name: Murray
line: Okay, I'm confused. What's going on here? A lovers' quarrel?

name: Nancy
line: No, no. I mean, we're just friends.

name: Murray
line: Friends. You've told me a lot of shockers today, but that, that is the first lie.

name: Murray
line: No? You're young, attractive. You've got chemistry, history, plus the real shit, shared trauma. Trust issues, am I right? Something to do with your dad.

name: Nancy
line: What? No, I mean, my dad's...

name: Murray
line: An asshole. Hmm. It is a curse to see so clearly.

name: Murray
line: You, you're harder to read. Probably, like everyone, afraid of what would happen if you accepted yourself for who you really are and retreated back to the safety of...

name: Murray
line: Steve. Oh. Steve. We like Steve.

name: Nancy
line: Yes. But we don't love Steve.

name: Nancy
line: No, we... I mean, I do.

name: Murray
line: There it is, ladies and germs, the second lie of the evening.

name: Murray
line: So, how'd I do? My goodness. You two are adorable, aren't you?

name: Murray
line: Listen... there's a pull-out sofa in my study if you want it. But if I were you, I'd cut the bullshit and share the damn bed.

name: Nancy
line: I just, uh... I just wanted to say that...

name: Jonathan
line: Oh, no, don't... I mean... He's so drunk.

name: Jonathan
line: I mean, what? He knows us for a couple of hours, and he's got us all figured out?

name: Jonathan
line: God. Okay, yeah. I feel... I'm glad we feel the same way.

name: Nancy
line: Uh... So, uh, good night, I guess.

name: Max
line: Oh, He-Man, thank you for saving my life. What strong muscles you have.

name: Lucas
line: No, actually, they're not. They don't even exist on the same planet.

name: Max
line: Aren't you too old to be playing with toys?

name: Lucas
line: That... that's not the point. The point is to stay out of my room.

name: Max
line: Then tell your little nerdy friend to shut his mouth.

name: Max
line: 'Code red, Lucas. Code red. Code red.'

name: Lucas
line: No, no, no, no, no, no.

name: Lucas
line: Dustin! This is Lucas. Do you copy? Dustin?

name: Dustin
line: Well, well, well, look who it is.

name: Lucas
line: Sorry, man. My stupid sister turned it off.

name: Dustin
line: Well, when you were having sister problems, Dart grew again, he escaped, and I'm pretty sure he's a baby Demogorgon.

name: Dustin
line: I'll explain later. Meet me and Steve at the old junkyard.

name: Dustin
line: And bring your binoculars and wrist rocket.

name: Dustin
line: Just be there, stat. Over and out.

name: Unknown
line: All right, cowboy, good news. We're giving you the green light.

name: Unknown
line: All right, well, got a present for ya.

name: Owens
line: All living organisms develop defense mechanisms against attack. They adapt. They find some way to survive.

name: Owens
line: It's pretty impressive, isn't it? It's been spreading, growing beneath us like some cancer.

name: Joyce
line: They made me sign, like, a thousand documents. I mean... we all had to. We had to. I mean, I lost track at a certain point. They're gonna make you do the same. I'm sure.

name: Joyce
line: Uh, confidentiality, and there were these official forms saying, like, nothing ever happened, which is why... Will got lost in the woods.

name: Bob
line: Man, I always thought stuff like this happened in movies and comic books. Certainly not in Hawkins, and certainly not to someone like you.

name: Joyce
line: Uh, just a little jitters, I guess.

name: Bob
line: Hey, don't you start worrying about me. Okay? I'm fine. I'm fine.

name: Bob
line: It's not like you didn't warn me. 'This is not a normal family.' Isn't that what you said?

name: Bob
line: It kinda makes my idea of moving to Maine sound a little less crazy, right?

name: Joyce
line: Oh, it... it's not crazy at all.

name: Joyce
line: Is there a doctor? We need a doctor!

name: Joyce
line: Sweetie, how you feeling? You okay?

name: Bob
line: It's me, big guy. It's Bob.

name: Bob
line: No. No, it's just me. Just... just Bob.

name: Murray
line: So, Jonathan, how was the pull-out?

name: Jonathan
line: Oh, yeah. Yeah, it was good.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, we just, um... We just had some fun girl time.

name: Karen
line: Will you be back for dinner?

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, I'll be home real soon.

name: Karen
line: Say hey to Ally for me.

name: Nancy
line: Okay. All right. I love you, too, Mom. Bye.

name: Nancy
line: She said Mike's at your brother's house. They just had a sleepover. So...

name: Jonathan
line: No. No, it's fine. They're probably just at the matinée or something.

name: Murray
line: Don't thank me yet. Just keep your eyes on the papers, hmm? And if you need to reach me again... don't.

name: Lucas
line: Proof that what I told you was real. But we have to hurry.

name: Billy
line: Who the hell were you talking to?

name: Unknown
line: Do you know... Do you know who I am?

name: Owens
line: How about, uh... How about this guy here? Know who that is?

name: Owens
line: It's all right. Take your time.

name: Hopper
line: What about me, kid? You remember me?

name: Hopper
line: They tell me you helped save me last night. You remember that? Do you remember anything about last night? About what happened?

name: Will
line: They shouldn't have done that. It upset him.

name: Owens
line: You say, 'Upset him.' Is that him?

name: Owens
line: Okay. Okay, I wanna try something. It's gonna seem a little odd at first, but I think it's really gonna help us understand what's going on. Is that okay?

name: Owens
line: Now, Will, I want you to just let us know if you feel anything. Okay?

name: Mike
line: Stop! You heard her! That's enough!

name: Owens
line: Our best guess right now is it's some kind of virus which is causing this neurological disorder. Now, when... when a typical virus attaches itself to its host... it duplicates, right? It spreads, essentially hijacking the host.

name: Owens
line: A virus is alive. It has an intelligence. That's not... That's not unusual. What is so unusual here, this virus... the infected hosts seem to be communicating.

name: Owens
line: It has some sort of a hive intelligence, and it's connecting all the hosts.

name: Owens
line: The good news is a virus can be cured. We... we're gonna continue to run tests. We're gonna see what we find.

name: Joyce
line: What happens when he can't remember anything? When there's nothing else there? What happens when my boy is gone?

name: Steve
line: All right, so let me get this straight. You kept something you knew was probably dangerous in order to impress a girl who... who you just met?

name: Dustin
line: All right, that's grossly oversimplifying things.

name: Steve
line: I mean, why would a girl like some nasty slug anyway?

name: Dustin
line: An interdimensional slug? Because it's awesome.

name: Steve
line: Well, even if she thought it was cool, which she didn't, I... I just... I don't know. I just feel like you're trying too hard.

name: Dustin
line: Well, not everyone can have your perfect hair, all right?

name: Steve
line: It's not about the hair, man. The key with girls is just... just acting like you don't care.

name: Steve
line: Yeah, exactly. It drives them nuts.

name: Steve
line: You just wait until, uh... until you feel it.

name: Steve
line: It's like before it's gonna storm, you know? You can't see it, but you can feel it, like this, uh... electricity, you know?

name: Dustin
line: Oh, like in the electromagnetic field when the clouds in the atmosphere...

name: Steve
line: No, no, no, no, no. Like a... Like a sexual electricity.

name: Steve
line: You feel that and then you make your move.

name: Dustin
line: So that's when you kiss her?

name: Steve
line: No, whoa, whoa. Slow down, Romeo.

name: Steve
line: Sure, okay, some girls, yeah, they want you to be aggressive. You know, strong, hot and heavy, like a... I don't know, like a lion. But others, you gotta be slow, you gotta be stealthy, like a... like a ninja.

name: Steve
line: Nancy's different. She's different than the other girls.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, she seems pretty special, I guess.

name: Dustin
line: But this girl's special, too, you know. It's just, like, something about her.

name: Steve
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey.

name: Steve
line: You're not falling in love with this girl, are you?

name: Steve
line: She's only gonna break your heart, and you're way too young for that shit.

name: Steve
line: It's Fabergé Organics. Use the shampoo and conditioner, and when your hair's damp... It's not wet, okay? When it's damp...

name: Steve
line: You do four puffs of the Farrah Fawcett spray.

name: Steve
line: Yeah, Farrah Fawcett. You tell anyone I just told you that and your ass is grass. You're dead, Henderson. Do you understand?

name: Hopper
line: I know that I've been gone too long, and, uh... It's... I just, I want you to know that it's not about you and it's not about our fight. Okay?

name: Hopper
line: Something came up, and I will... I will explain it all when I see you.

name: Hopper
line: I just... I want you to know that I'm not mad. I'm just sorry. About everything.

name: Hopper
line: I... I don't want you to get hurt at all. And I don't wanna lose you.

name: Hopper
line: Just make sure you heat up some real food. Not just Eggos. And I want you to eat all the peas, even if they're mushy and gross. And... I will be home soon.

name: Unknown
line: And there are the hippocampal abnormalities we had discussed. Nothing out of line with what we've seen from others suffering from post-traumatic stress. But...

name: Unknown
line: this is Will from last night.

name: Unknown
line: And as you can see, there are now abnormalities in the limbic and paralimbic areas.

name: Unknown
line: And this... is from an hour ago.

name: Unknown
line: We have bigger problems than the boy.

name: Unknown
line: We can't keep delaying the burn.

name: Unknown
line: You're talking about putting... putting a Band-Aid on this.

name: Unknown
line: Right now, a Band-Aid is the best option.

name: Owens
line: And if it kills the boy?

name: Unknown
line: Then quite frankly, Sam, it kills him.

name: Unknown
line: The rate this is spreading, he'll be lost by the end of the day. What we do or don't do won't change the outcome.

name: Unknown
line: We have to start the burn.

name: Joyce
line: What the hell is taking so long?

name: Bob
line: Hey... doctors take forever, always. Just try and relax. Just be patient.

name: Joyce
line: You know, I just... Let me through. Let me through!

name: Unknown
line: You know we can't do that.

name: Joyce
line: You said that an hour ago.

name: Mike
line: What's wrong? Are you hurting again?

name: Will
line: I think I know how to stop him.

name: Steve
line: Oh, yeah. Yeah, this will do.

name: Steve
line: This will do just fine. Good call, dude.

name: Dustin
line: 'So what?' You wanted to tell her, too.

name: Lucas
line: But I didn't, all right? We agreed not to tell her and to look for Dart.

name: Lucas
line: Are you suggesting that I'm lying?

name: Dustin
line: I'm saying you have a creepy little bond with him.

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, that was before he turned into a Demogorgon.

name: Dustin
line: And you haven't heard from Mike?

name: Dustin
line: Why do you think I'm with Steve Harrington?

name: Dustin
line: Which is why we need as much help as we can get.

name: Dustin
line: You probably didn't tell it right.

name: Steve
line: Hey! Dickheads! How come the only one helping me out is this random girl? We lose light in 40 minutes. Let's go. Let's go, I said!

name: Joyce
line: What... What is all of this?

name: Unknown
line: Just give him a moment, okay?

name: Hopper
line: Hey, jackass, why don't you do us all a favor and shut up, okay?

name: Mike
line: That's what? What... what's there, Will?

name: Will
line: I don't know. I just know he doesn't want me to see there.

name: Unknown
line: Let's see if this kid's a wizard or schizo, Doc.

name: Unknown
line: First door on your right, gentlemen.

name: Max
line: So you really fought one of these things before?

name: Max
line: And you're, like, totally, 100% sure it wasn't a bear?

name: Dustin
line: Shit. Don't be an idiot. Okay? It wasn't a bear.

name: Dustin
line: Why are you even here if you don't believe us? Just go home.

name: Max
line: Geesh. Someone's cranky. Past your bedtime?

name: Steve
line: That's good. Just show her you don't care.

name: Steve
line: Why are you winking, Steve? Stop.

name: Max
line: The fog, I mean. Looks like the ocean.

name: Max
line: Hawkins seems pretty lame, I bet.

name: Lucas
line: No, no, no, it's not that. It's just... My dad's still there. So...

name: Lucas
line: It's this legal term called 'divorce.' See, when two married people don't love each other anymore...

name: Lucas
line: My mom and my stepdad, they wanted a fresh start away from him.

name: Lucas
line: As if... As if he was the problem, which is total bull.

name: Lucas
line: And things... are just worse now.

name: Lucas
line: My stepbrother's always been a dick, but now he's just angry... all the time and...

name: Lucas
line: Well, he can't take it out on my mom, so...

name: Max
line: So he takes it out on you?

name: Lucas
line: I don't even know why I'm telling you this.

name: Lucas
line: It's just... I know that I can be a jerk like him sometimes, and I do not want to be like him. Ever.

name: Lucas
line: I guess I'm angry, too, and... I'm sorry.

name: Lucas
line: Hey. You're nothing like your brother, okay? You're cool and different. And you're super smart.

name: Max
line: Nobody actually says that, you know.

name: Max
line: And it makes you seem really cool.

name: Lucas
line: I like talking with you, Mad Max.

name: Max
line: And I like talking with you, stalker.

name: Lucas
line: I've got eyes! Ten o'clock! Ten o'clock!

name: Dustin
line: He's not taking the bait. Why is he not taking the bait?

name: Max
line: Steve? Steve, what are you doing?

name: Steve
line: Human tastes better than cat, I promise.

name: Dustin
line: They can't get in! They can't!

name: Dustin
line: Is anyone there? Mike? Will? God! Anyone!

name: Dustin
line: We're at the old junkyard, and we are going to die!

name: Steve
line: Out of the way! Out of the way! You want some? Come get this!

name: Unknown
line: Looks like your kid's full of shit, Doc.

name: Joyce
line: What? What do you mean, sweetie?

name: Joyce
line: Who? Who made you do what?

name: Will
line: I told you. They upset him.

name: Will
line: They shouldn't have done that. They shouldn't have upset him.

name: Joyce
line: I need to get through! It's a trap! It's a trap! I need to warn them. It's a trap!

name: Unknown
line: I can't see shit! Where are they? Where are they?

name: Joyce
line: Will, sweets, talk to me. You got to help me understand.
